name: Lup
description: Lup is a 2D platformer with heart, throughout the game you'll have to overcome enemies and challenges using weapons and items.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible

reviews.review_text: Only reason you should play this is if you got paid to do so.   I waited in the menu for 3 minutes just to be able to write this review.
10/10 game I love the game because lup sounds like sup
Calling this baby's first unity game would be an insult to both babies and unity

Jerky camera, bad jumps from walls, enemys who don't die, invisible walls that insta kills, insta kill objects that don't ways insta kill, dying and going to the next level anway, suddenly having new guns with grading noises, an old guy who can't be bothered to ask your name.  The answer to your question, is no.
